questions: There are   _   people in the Johnsons.
article:
Let's meet the Johnson's family. Mr.Johnson is a manageer in a big company . He works very hard. He is very busy. He makes much money.But he is always tired . He says to his friend,"I want to be a reporter because I like talking to people."
His wife Mrs. Johonson is a good doctor .She works in children' Hospital. She likes Chinese medicine  very much.
The Johnsons have a daughter called Salina.She is a teacher of French. She always tells her students many interesting stories.They are good friends. They like her.
